review_title: Title: "Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night: Relax and Unwind with Soothing Herbal Tea"
review_text:
Review: "Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night tea is a caffeine-free herbal blend designed to promote relaxation and restful sleep. Each box contains 16 tea bags, providing a comforting and soothing experience before bedtime.

Crafted with the finest organic ingredients, this tea features a blend of chamomile and passionflower. Chamomile has long been known for its calming properties, while passionflower helps to ease tension and promote tranquility.

Traditional Medicinals takes pride in sourcing high-quality organic herbs, ensuring a pure and flavorful tea experience. The tea bags are made from unbleached fibers, preserving the natural integrity of the herbs.

To enjoy a cup of Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night tea, simply steep a tea bag in hot water for 5-10 minutes. Take a moment to savor the gentle floral aroma and sip your way to a peaceful state of mind.

Incorporate Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night tea into your evening routine to unwind and prepare for a restful night's sleep. Experience the soothing effects of chamomile and passionflower, and wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated."

review_title: Relax and Unwind with Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night Tea
review_text:
Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night Tea has become my trusted companion for unwinding after a long day and preparing for a restful night's sleep. Crafted with care using organic chamomile and passionflower, this caffeine-free herbal blend offers a soothing and calming experience that promotes relaxation and tranquility.

What sets this tea apart is its thoughtful combination of herbs, each chosen for its gentle yet effective calming properties. Chamomile has long been celebrated for its ability to promote relaxation and alleviate stress, while passionflower adds a layer of tranquility, helping to quiet the mind and prepare the body for sleep.

The quality of the ingredients is evident from the moment you open the box. The aroma of the herbs is delicate yet invigorating, setting the stage for a truly delightful tea-drinking experience. I appreciate knowing that I'm sipping on a blend that is free from artificial additives or preservatives, allowing me to enjoy the pure and natural flavors of the herbs.

Not only does this tea taste wonderful, but it also delivers on its promise of promoting restful sleep. I've found that brewing a cup of Traditional Medicinals Nighty Night Tea before bedtime helps me unwind and relax, making it easier to drift off into a peaceful slumber. It has become an indispensable part of my nighttime routine, helping me wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated each morning.

I also appreciate the convenience of the individually wrapped tea bags, making it easy to enjoy a cup of this calming blend wherever I go. Whether I'm at home or traveling, I can always count on Traditional Medicinals to provide a moment of tranquility whenever I need it most.

In conclusion, I highly recommend Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night Tea to anyone seeking a natural and effective way to promote relaxation and support a restful night's sleep. With its carefully selected blend of organic herbs and soothing aroma, this tea is sure to become a cherished part of your daily wellness routine.

Herbal tea, also known as herbal infusion or tisane, is a beverage made from the infusion of herbs, spices, flowers, or other plant materials in hot water. It has been consumed for centuries for its various health benefits. Some of the key benefits of herbal tea include:

1. Antioxidant Properties: Many herbal teas are rich in antioxidants, which help protect the body from damage caused by harmful molecules known as free radicals. Antioxidants can help reduce the risk of chronic diseases and promote overall health.

2. Relaxation and Stress Relief: Certain herbal teas, such as chamomile and peppermint tea, have calming properties that can help reduce stress and anxiety. These teas are often used to promote relaxation and improve sleep quality.

3. Digestive Health: Herbal teas like ginger tea and peppermint tea are known for their digestive benefits. They can help alleviate symptoms of indigestion, bloating, and nausea by promoting healthy digestion.

4. Immune System Support: Some herbal teas, such as echinacea and elderberry tea, are believed to boost the immune system and help the body fight off infections and illnesses.

5. Hydration: Herbal teas are a great way to stay hydrated, especially for those who prefer non-caffeinated beverages. Staying hydrated is essential for overall health and well-being.

6. Weight Management: Certain herbal teas, like green tea and dandelion tea, may aid in weight management by boosting metabolism and promoting fat burning.

7. Anti-Inflammatory Effects: Many herbs used in herbal teas have anti-inflammatory properties that can help reduce inflammation in the body and alleviate symptoms of conditions like arthritis.

8. Skin Health: Herbal teas rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds can contribute to healthy skin by reducing oxidative stress and inflammation.

Incorporating a variety of herbal teas into your daily routine can provide a range of health benefits beyond just hydration and flavor.

Description

Sleep Wellness
Promotes a Good Night's Sleep
Herbal Supplement
USDA Organic
Certified Organic by CCOF
All Ingredients Certified Organic
Non GMO Project Verified
Kosher
Certified B Corporation
Herbal Power

Helps you relax and get a good night's sleep.

Taste

Minty and sweet with notes of citrus and spice.

Plant Story

Generations of native South Americans have used passionflower to soothe the nervous system and help relive occasional sleeplessness. Our herbalists appreciate both its wild beauty and its herbal power, blending it with calming herbs like chamomile and linden flower to help you sleep easy.

Herbs That Work

From field to cup, we make sure our teas deliver the benefits of these amazing plants. To deliver consistent high quality teas, we source organically farmed or organically wild-collected herbs from ethical trading partnerships, seeking out medicinal-grade plants. Only a small fraction of the world's herb supply meets our high quality standards.

I have chronic sleep issue and have tried dozens and dozens of sleep aids.  TM's nighty night tea is one of the few that works reliably to improve my sleep.  When I take it in the evening , I still wake up during the night but I am able to fall back to sleep.

A soothing herbal tea that has become an essential part of my bedtime routine. This tea is pure relaxation in a cup.

The blend of organic herbs, including valerian and chamomile, promotes a tranquil and restful sleep. I've experienced nights of deep, uninterrupted slumber since incorporating it into my evenings.

What's impressive is the quality and purity of the ingredients. It's free from artificial additives, making it a healthy choice for relaxation and sleep support.

Traditional Medicinals‚Äô Organic Nighty Night tea combines the calming qualities of passionflower to ensure a restful sleep. Each tea packet is designed to relax the mind and body. Being caffeine-free, it‚Äôs a perfect evening choice. This brew doesn‚Äôt just promise tranquility but also brings the benefits of organic ingredients, ensuring a peaceful night without any artificial elements.

This is one of my favourite tea. I usually drink it at bedtime. It has good composition of mixed relaxation tea. Also it‚Äôs caffeine free so don‚Äôt worry about this. I finally tried this tea and followed the directions, letting it steep for 4 minutes. I noticed that my eyelids were getting heavy within a half hour or so of watching TV. review_title: Embrace the Night's Serenity with Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night Tea
review_text:
Traditional Medicinals has truly captured the essence of peaceful nights with their Organic Nighty Night Tea ‚Äì a soothing blend that invites you to embrace tranquility and unwind after a long day. Allow me to share my experience with this delightful and calming herbal infusion.

Upon opening the box, the gentle and earthy aroma of the tea envelopes you, setting the tone for a restful tea-drinking experience. The individually wrapped tea bags ensure freshness with every cup, making it easy to indulge in a calming ritual whenever needed.

The flavor profile of this tea is a masterful combination of herbs that promote relaxation and tranquility. The soothing notes of organic chamomile and passionflower are expertly balanced, creating a warm and comforting taste that's perfect for unwinding before bedtime.

What truly stands out about this blend is its ability to prepare both the body and mind for restful sleep. The careful selection of ingredients, including valerian root and licorice, contributes to a calming effect that helps ease the stresses of the day and encourages a peaceful night's sleep.

I appreciate Traditional Medicinals' commitment to using organic and ethically sourced ingredients. Knowing that I'm sipping on a cup of tea that's made with integrity and care adds an extra layer of comfort to the experience.

The tea bags are easy to use, and the brewing instructions provided on the packaging ensure that you achieve the perfect infusion every time. Whether you prefer a milder or stronger cup, you have the flexibility to adjust the steeping time to your liking.

In summary, Traditional Medicinals Organic Nighty Night Tea is a wonderful addition to anyone's nighttime routine. Its harmonious blend of flavors, calming effects, and dedication to quality make it a must-have for those seeking a peaceful and restorative tea-drinking experience. If you're in search of a soothing herbal infusion that helps you embrace the night's serenity, this tea is a delightful choice.

I have tried the Nighty Night Extra and wanted something lighter and the composition for this concoction is actually more soothing with the chamomile.

I had a lovely deep sleep and drank it as instructed - 1.5 hours before bedtime and this herbal tea is a game-changer!

This tea is delicious and makes me fall asleep almost immediately. I highly recommend it for helping is the transition to bedtime. It is caffeine free and has Valerian added, which combined with the chamomile gives it a very good flavor.

This has become part of my night time ritual before bedtime.  I was using melatonin and over the counter sleep aids, but they didn‚Äôt always work.  

What kept me from trying this previously was having to drink fluids before bedtime, but it‚Äôs less of an issue as long as it helps me to relax and sleep.  At most I drink 6 oz of this each time, but I could make it more concentrated by using less water (boiled) and simmer (best to move the teabag around) for a bit longer than 15 minutes.

So far so good, and it tastes good too (the mint does stand out but not overwhelming).  I will continue to drink this at night!

review_title: nice herbal blend for the evening

review_title: Tea, the result of which you can feel after 1 cup!
review_text: Stress and anxiety haunt me, so I decided to resort to the help of medicinal teas. I saw a good review from a blogger about this tea and decided to take it, especially since there was a sale. Decaffeinated tea, soothing, organic - solid benefits. You can drink up to 2-3 cups a day, but tea turned out to be very effective for me, so I will not drink more than 1 cup. For 3 evenings in a row, I took tea 30-40 minutes before bedtime and on the fourth day in the morning I could not wake up. I am usually cheerful in the morning. I conclude that it is better to drink tea a few hours before bedtime. Another trouble happened - the pressure dropped, I don't know if it was connected with tea or not, but it coincided exactly on the 4th day after 3 days of tea intake. If you have pressure problems, then be careful. I already drank other soothing teas and this one seemed to me too monotonous in taste, lacking some kind of "zest". You will definitely not remember it from several and will not dream of it. In terms of taste, the tea did not impress me, I do not plan to buy it a second time. I want the result to be tasty. I bought it at a sale for 312 rubles. 1 tea party turns out to be 19 rubles. If you buy 400 rubles for the full price, then 1 cup will be 25 rubles. Tea really does have a relaxing effect, but next time I will make a choice not in favor of this tea. Thanks for attention! I would be grateful for the like!
